items.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 17 October 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64310-4 Linear carbon (Cn), an elusive sp hybridized carbon allotrope, has attracted much interest both experimentally and among theorists due to remarkable properties and significant controversy. items.title: Hydride formation pressures and kinetics in individual Pd nanoparticles with systematically varied levels of plastic deformation
items.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 17 October 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64311-3 Authors study H2 absorption in single Pd nanoparticles with systematically varied plastic deformation. items.title: A frugal Spiking Neural Network for unsupervised multivariate temporal pattern classification and multichannel spike sorting
items.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 17 October 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64231-2 Novel brain implants generate massive data flow to be processed efficiently.
